mapper.select: SELECT (CASE #{ostrTpCd} WHEN '261' THEN '161' WHEN '281' THEN '161' WHEN '123' THEN '123' ELSE '' END) || #{ostrDt} || LPAD(SQ_SVST_ITM_STR_IZ$ITM_STR_NO.NEXTVAL,7,'0') AS ITM_STR_NO FROM DUAL
SELECT A.HGR_WARE_NO FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ A WHERE 1 = 1 AND APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{vstFshDt}, 1, 6) AND WARE_NO = #{wkWareNo}
SELECT A.HGR_WARE_NO FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ A WHERE 1 = 1 AND APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{vstFshDt}, 1, 6) AND WARE_NO = #{hgrWareNo}

SELECT REPLACE(TRIM(''),' ', '') || ' ' || #{cfrmDt} || ' ' || #{fnlItmGdCd} || '급 ' || DECODE(#{rtngdProcsTpCd},'80','리퍼작업완료-A급','81','리퍼작업완료-B-1급','82','리퍼작업완료-B-2급','') || ' 리퍼완료 기타 출고 입니다.' FROM DUAL
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ SET MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY - DECODE(#{fnlItmGdCd}, 'A', #{useQty},0) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY - DECODE(#{fnlItmGdCd}, 'A', #{useQty},0) END , MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY - DECODE(#{fnlItmGdCd}, 'B', #{useQty},0) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY - DECODE(#{fnlItmGdCd}, 'B', #{useQty},0) END , MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY - DECODE(#{fnlItmGdCd}, 'E', #{useQty},0) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY - DECODE(#{fnlItmGdCd}, 'E', #{useQty},0) END , MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY - DECODE(#{fnlItmGdCd}, 'R', #{useQty},0) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY - DECODE(#{fnlItmGdCd}, 'R', #{useQty},0) END
WHERE WARE_NO = #{upHgrWareNo} AND ITM_PD_CD = #{itmPdCd}
mapper.select: SELECT WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{cfrmDt},1,6) AND WARE_NO = #{hgrWareNo}
SELECT WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{cfrmDt},1,6) AND WARE_NO = #{upHgrWareNo}

SELECT T1.ITM_OSTR_NO AS OSTR_AK_NO , T1.OSTR_SN AS OSTR_AK_SN , T1.OSTR_TP_CD AS OSTR_AK_TP_CD , T1.OSTR_DT AS OSTR_AK_RGST_DT , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS STR_HOP_DT , 'MV' AS LGST_STR_TP_CD , 'WE' AS IOST_AK_DV_CD , T1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO AS WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO , T1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AS WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD , '' AS SAP_IOST_TP_CD , '6' AS LGST_SPP_MTHD_CD , T1.ITM_PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD , T1.OSTR_QTY AS OSTR_AK_QTY , T1.ITM_GD_CD AS ITM_GD_CD , T1.OSTR_WARE_NO AS OSTR_OJ_WARE_NO , A1.WARE_NO AS SV_CNR_CD /*서비스센터코드*/ , A1.WARE_NM AS SV_CNR_NM /*서비스센터명*/ , T1.RMK_CN AS RMK_CN FROM TB_SVST_ITM_OSTR_IZ T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT T2.APY_YM /* 적용년월 */ , T2.WARE_DV_CD /* 창고구분코드 */ , T2.WARE_DTL_DV_CD /* 창고상세구분코드 */ , T2.WARE_NO /* 창고번호 */ , T2.WARE_NM /* 창고명 */ , T3.PRTNR_KNM AS WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NM , T5.RNADR || ' ' || T5.RDADR AS ADR_NM , T4.LOCARA_TNO , T4.EXNO_ENCR , T4.IDV_TNO FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T2 /* 월별창고내역 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T3 /* 파트너기본 */ ON T3.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD AND T3.PRTNR_NO = T2.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_OG_BAS T4 /* 조직내역 */ ON T4.OG_ID = T2.OG_ID AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS T5 /* 주소기본 */ ON T5.ADR_ID = T2.WARE_ADR_ID AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE T2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYYMM') ) A1 ON A1.WARE_NO = T1.OSTR_WARE_NO WHERE T1.ITM_OSTR_NO = #{itmOstrNo} AND T1.OSTR_SN = #{ostrSn}
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ T1 SET T1.MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN (T1.MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{fnlItmGdCd}, 'A', #{useQty},0)) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE (T1.MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{fnlItmGdCd}, 'A', #{useQty},0)) END , T1.MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN (T1.MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{fnlItmGdCd}, 'B', #{useQty},0)) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE (T1.MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{fnlItmGdCd}, 'B', #{useQty},0)) END , T1.MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN (T1.MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{fnlItmGdCd}, 'E', #{useQty},0)) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE (T1.MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{fnlItmGdCd}, 'E', #{useQty},0)) END , T1.MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY = CASE WHEN (T1.MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{fnlItmGdCd}, 'R', #{useQty},0)) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE (T1.MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY - DECODE( #{fnlItmGdCd}, 'R', #{useQty},0)) END
WHERE T1.WARE_NO = (CASE #{rtngdProcsTpCd} WHEN '20' THEN '100010' WHEN '21' THEN '100004' ELSE '' END) AND T1.ITM_PD_CD = #{itmPdCd}
